If you want to delete your wallet, pleas: If you want to delete your wallet, please be sure that you have saved your PRIVATE KEY.
Remember, deleting your wallet can resul: Remember, deleting your wallet can result in permanent loss of access to your funds !!!
Click_PLUS: Click the PLUS icon on the Wallets page and then click the button 'Create New Wallet'. Give your wallet any name and confirm by clicking the button. You will be redirected to the wallets page with the newly created wallet.
Before making any deposits to this addre: Before making any deposits to this address, copy and securely export your private key. We don't hold or keep your private keys. They are stored only in the local storage of your cell phone.
If you restart your phone, delete cache: If you restart your phone, delete cache or lose your phone, you will lose all your funds if you didn't save your private key. If your private key is saved, you can use it with
or desktop wallet to access your funds.
IMPORT_PRIVATE KEY: If you have the Private Key of your wallet, you can import it by clicking the PLUS icon on the wallets page and then the button 'IMPORT WALLET FROM PRIVATE KEY'. When the modal opens, enter a name for this wallet and the Private Key. After confirming, you will be redirected to the wallets page and see your imported wallet.
Keystore_Password: If you have the Keystore and Password of your wallet, you can import it by clicking the PLUS icon on the wallets page and then the button 'IMPORT WALLET FROM KEYSTORE'. When the modal opens, click the button 'OPEN KEYSTORE', enter a name for this wallet, and the Password. After confirming, you will be redirected to the wallets page and see your imported wallet.
testWalletFeatures: To test the wallet's features, click the Settings button and  choose TESTNET as an option. Then, go to
to get free testnet coins. Copy the addr: to get free testnet coins. Copy the address from your mobile wallet and paste it in the faucet. You will receive 2 TESTNET DUBX coins.
You can use all your addresses for both: You can use all your addresses for both mainnet and testnet. When you are on the testnet network, you will see the balance of TESTNET DUBX COINS, and when you are on the mainnet, you will see the real balance of DUBX.
network_TESTNET: When you change the network to TESTNET on the Settings page, any actions you perform in the wallet will not affect your mainnet DUBX balance. To ensure a smooth experience, we recommend creating 2 new addresses when you first open the wallet. Obtain free TESTNET coins for one of these addresses and try sending them from one address to another.
loseTESTNET: If you lose TESTNET coins, don't worry, you can always obtain new ones. Feel free to spend testnet coins as much as you wish, as we have plenty available for you. This way, you can become comfortable using the wallet safely on the  mainnet without any concerns about testnet coins.
Network_status: At the top of the Wallet Detail page, the Network status will indicate whether you are on Testnet or Mainnet. Based on this, you can fill out the form with the recipient's Address and the Amount you want to send in DUBX coins. During the sending process, you will receive real-time updates about the mining status of the transaction.
TXINFO_history: Once the transaction is mined and confirmed, you can click  on the 'TX INFO' button to access all the relevant information about the transaction. This includes details such as the Transaction Hash, Block Number, Timestamp, Address From, Address To, and the sent Amount. You can easily copy this data by clicking the copy icon located on the right side of each field.
At the bottom of the Wallet Detail Page,: At the bottom of the Wallet Detail Page, you can click on the icon to share the QR Code of your wallet's address. Additionally, you have the option to copy your wallet's address if needed.
Wallet_Detail_Page: If you are on the MAINNET network, you can find an icon at the bottom of the Wallet Detail Page. Clicking this icon will display the last 5 transactions for the specific wallet you are currently viewing. The transaction history is retrieved using an API and serves as a relevant source of information. You can copy all the data from each transaction by clicking the copy icon located on the right side of each field.
TESTNET_tx: On the other hand, if you are on the TESTNET network, you will see the last 5 transactions for all wallets. These transactions are stored locally in the mobile phone's storage. However, it's important to note that if you restart your phone or clear the cache, this TESTNET transaction history will be lost.
clearing: This button is very useful for clearing all the data in the form, including the 'Address To,' 'Amount,' and 'TX INFO' fields. It essentially functions as a refresh button, allowing you to start anew when sending coins. Clicking this button will clear the existing data, providing a clean slate for your next transaction.
delete_wallet: To delete this wallet, click on the 'Remove Wallet' button. Please read the warning message carefully before proceeding with the deletion.
Choose your preferred language by clicki: Choose your preferred language by clicking the 'Settings' button and then find the button with the language of your choice.
Besides the links for the 'Wallets' and: Besides the links for the 'Wallets' and 'Settings' pages, here you can find the current status of the network and language settings.
I want to setup PIN now: I want to setup, change or remove PIN now
First_opening: When you first open the app, you will be given the option to set up a PIN or skip this step. If you choose to secure your app with a PIN, make sure to remember it, as you won't be able to access your funds if you forget it. If you haven't saved your private key either, you risk losing all your funds. You can skip setting up a PIN initially and enable it later by going to the Settings page and clicking 'Enable PIN setup'
How to setup PIN: To set up a PIN, enter a 4-digit number and click 'OK.' You'll see the 'CONFIRM PIN' button appear, and you'll need to enter the same 4-digit number again and click 'CONFIRM PIN.' Once your PIN is set up, you will be redirected to the home page where you can create a new wallet or import an existing one.
Saved_PIN: Your PIN is saved in the local storage of your phone. If you clear the cache of your cell phone or in any way clear local storage, you will be prompted to set up a new PIN or skip the setup.
Skip_PIN: If you don't want to use a PIN, click 'Skip PIN Setup.' If you change your mind and want to enable PIN setup later, go to the Settings page and click 'Enable PIN setup.' By clicking this, you will be redirected to the initial setup screen where you can set up a PIN.
Remove_PIN: If you currently have a PIN, but decide to remove it, go to the Settings page and click 'Change or Remove PIN.' This will delete the old PIN and display 'I want to setup, change, or remove PIN now.' By clicking this, you will be redirected to the initial setup screen where you can skip the PIN setup.
Change_PIN_with_new: If you currently have a PIN, but decide to change it, go to the Settings page and click 'Change or Remove PIN.' This will delete the old PIN and display 'I want to setup, change, or remove PIN now.' By clicking this, you will be redirected to the initial setup screen where you can set up a new PIN.
Unlock: If you have successfully set up a PIN, every time you open the wallet, you will be asked to enter the PIN to unlock the wallet.
Reenable: If you previously skipped setting up a PIN but have changed your mind, go to the Settings page and click 'Enable PIN setup.' By clicking this, you will be redirected to the initial setup screen where you can set up a PIN.
